website_summaries.verdict: The Vibram FiveFingers V-Run provides a combination of support, durability and better ground contact. Several users admired the shoe's performance on the road, and despite being slightly expensive, a lot still recommend the shoe. The V-Run is equipped with the necessary technologies to surely perform well even on extremely low temperatures.
pros: Many runners applauded the lightweight construction of the Vibram FiveFingers V-Run
This shoe is highly breathable as mentioned in some reviews
The V-Run is available in different color options
This shoe is reliable when used on extremely cold conditions
cons: The sole wears out quickly based on some reviews

customer_reviews.title: My 6th pair of Five Fingers
customer_reviews.text: I have used Five Finger shoes for walking, road and trail running, and gym work for many years. The V-Runs were purchased to replace my original pair of Bikila Evos that eventually wore out after over 1000 miles of running. These shoes last for a long time compared to normal trainers and provide a near barefoot experience. They are the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn and have reduced the number of injuries I used to get when running in other shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True to size.  Amazing for uneven surfaces and grass.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 5.5 in Nike and Adidas. I ordered a size 5.5 - 6 (38) in these vibrams and they fit well. I've not quite got the courage to run in these yet. I broke my foot 6 months ago so do still need some support. However I walk and exercise in these - they are amazing for uneven surfaces and grass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: FYI I am a size 7 UK, so I went with 7/7.5 vs 6.5/7. Fits quite well. I've also had trouble finding good running shoes because I have wide feet, so too narrow shoes screws up my running posture and gives me pain. In the end, I decided to go with these and they did the trick! Will also caveat that one should read about barefoot running first before getting a pair or you may injure yourself. Safety first.
customer_reviews.author: Fan

customer_reviews.title: Briliant minimalist running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Briliant shoes! This is the improved version of bikila model. Very robust sole and outer material. Still very flexible and light. You can feel pure joy of minimalist running. After 100 miles nearly no signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Wronka

customer_reviews.title: Names change, but the shoe is still the same good old Bikila!
customer_reviews.text: Been running with them for the past 10 years and this is only my third pair (the second one served me for 3 years and over 5k km. Ended up with holes on the sole under the toes, but otherwise very much in shape! Hope the new pair (now called vRun, but actually virtually indistinguishable) shall follow suite!
customer_reviews.author: Oleg Brovko

customer_reviews.title: Great durable minimalist road running shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of V-runs, I get about 800-900 miles before they start to wear out. Great for road running, so long as it’s not icy or too muddy. For those runs you need the v-trail or treks.
customer_reviews.author: Nik Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Perseverance is key.
customer_reviews.text: A litter strange at first. Thought my second pair, having sent my first back because they were too small were also too small. With a little perseverance they are soon comfy. Snug but they are meant to fit like a glover. Will definitely be ordering another pair from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hobson

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Great runners so impressed. Great on my knees and back. I have been running on tough terrain and the vibram are well able to match it. I would advice you to also buy the 5 toe socks. Makes it very easy getting your toes into each section. Quick delivery too.
customer_reviews.author: Colm

customer_reviews.title: Really love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Really love these shoes. They feel so great on the feet. Hard to get into a first but with a little time you develop a system to get them on.
customer_reviews.author: Lawless1895

customer_reviews.title: snug and light
customer_reviews.text: great product, immediately ran 20k without issues, the best Vibram for long distance road running.
customer_reviews.author: KYRIAKOS-SAAD

product_meta.title: Vibram FiveFingers Men's V-Run Training Shoes
product_meta.description: An ideal running shoe for those making the transition from traditional to minimalist shoe
feature_bullets: Stretch mesh uppers - Provide a flexible fit.
Perforations - Increase ventilation to keep you cool.
Pull tab and cord closure - Provides a firm, adjustable fit.
Dri-lex sockliner - For odour control and moisture-management.
